code: set.seed(123) # For reproducibility  # Data for random subsampling and k-fold cross-validation corrections  x <- stats::rnorm(30, mean = 0.6, sd = 0.1) y <- stats::rnorm(30, mean = 0.4, sd = 0.1)  # Data for repeated k-fold cross-validation correction  tmp <- data.frame(model = rep(c(1, 2), each = 60),                   values = c(stats::rnorm(60, mean = 0.6, sd = 0.1),                               stats::rnorm(60, mean = 0.4, sd = 0.1)),                   k = rep(c(1, 1, 2, 2), times = 15),                   r = rep(c(1, 2), times = 30))

code: rss <- resampled_ttest(x = x, y = y, n = 30, n1 = 80, n2 = 20) kcv <- kfold_ttest(x = x, y = y, n = 100, k = 30) rkcv <- repkfold_ttest(data = tmp, n1 = 80, n2 = 20, k = 2, r = 2) print(rss) ##   statistic    p.value ## 1  2.407318 0.02265982 resampled_ttest(x = x, y = y, n = 30, n1 = 80, n2 = 20,                  tailed = "one", greater = "x") ##   statistic    p.value ## 1  2.407318 0.01132991 kfold_ttest(x = x, y = y, n = 100, k = 30,              tailed = "one", greater = "x") ##   statistic      p.value ## 1  6.052149 1.281991e-08 repkfold_ttest(data = tmp, n1 = 80, n2 = 20, k = 2, r = 2,                 tailed = "one", greater = 1) ##   statistic    p.value ## 1   1.97102 0.07165217
